ComicInfo.Title: Remembrance
ComicInfo.Summary:
Julie Pezzini has led a rough life, including a stint in prison. But that's nothing compared to being the sister of an NYPD Detective who also happens to wield a powerful mystic weapon. Even Sara and the Witchblade might not be enough to keep Julie safe in Sara's world of supernatural threats!
Sara's job is on the line as her mental stability is being questioned. As she navigates the days after the horrible event that left both her sister dead and her daughter kidnapped, she finds herself standing over her sisters grave. Her world imploding around her, she finds the last person that should be in the graveyard, and theres answeres to be had of him.
